definition: stick-like implement inserted into the handles of a tripod cauldron in ancient times in order to lift the cauldron/commonly used in Korean names, transcribed as "hyun"
Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008
Xu Xuan (-991), author of commentaries on Shuowen Jiezi 說文解字註|说文解字注[Shuo1 wen2 Jie3 zi4 Zhu4]

sentences.english: On this trip I have to visit several important customers.
sentences.chinese: 铉这次出差我要拜访几位重要客户。

sentences.english: Xuan Zhu is inside school exclusive a student that read, also do not have other friend.
sentences.chinese: 铉洙是校内唯一一名读书的学生，也没有其他朋友。

sentences.english: While looking for Huizhu, Xuangui finds her being shoved into a car by kidnapper.
sentences.chinese: 正当铉圭找慧珠时，发现她被绑匪绑架塞进上了车里。

sentences.english: Xuangui expresses his love to Danya, but she rejects him.
sentences.chinese: 铉圭对丹雅表达爱意，却遭她拒绝。

sentences.english: Listen as they hammer out one chord.
sentences.chinese: 听听他们猛击同一个和铉。

sentences.english: He has a brother named Kang-ho who is known as a 'die-hard detective'.
sentences.chinese: 铉洙是校内唯一一名读书的学生，也没有其他朋友。

definition: sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes
bright/luminous/white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
